original_text: It came to pass also in the twelfth year, in the fifteenth day of the month, that the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
korean_text: 열두째 해 어느 달 열다섯째 날에 여호와의 말씀이 내게 임하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: It came to pass also in the twelfth year
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 열두 해째 되는 해에 일어났으니

sentences.original_text: in the fifteenth day of the month
that the word of the Lord came unto me
